name: Cleanup and Commit Changes
description: Clean up unused imports/styles, update documentation, and commit changes to git
prompt:
Perform the following tasks:
1. Check all modified component files for unused imports and remove them
2. Check all modified component files for unused CSS styles in StyleSheet.create() and remove them
3. Update .kiro/steering/project-standards.md with any new component architecture changes
4. Stage all modified files with git add
5. Create a descriptive commit message following conventional commits format
6. Commit the changes to git

Provide a summary of what was cleaned up and committed.
